      • addUserToActivity

        @PutMapping("/{id}/addusers/{iduser}")
public boolean addUserToActivity​(@PathVariable(name="id")

                                 @PathVariable(name="iduser")
                                 java.lang.Long iduser)
        This allow to add an user as a participant in a given activity
        Parameters:
        id - - is the id of the activity in which the user participate in
        iduser - - is the id of the user to add
        Returns:
        true - if the add was successful
        false - if not
